page.title: 02BEMUCHLYE FARM GOLLANFIELD
page.content: Bemuchlye farm is a mixed cattle farm.It is owned by {Rose of Kilravock but farmed by Mr&Mrs Miller.They have 350 sheep, some cows, hens and dogs, all of which have a vital role in a farm.They used to have pigs which he kept in sheds and garages. The crops are barley,grass,and turnips.The soil is very light and stony. The busiest time in the year for the farmers is spring. They have got to plough fields,look after lambs and look out for foxes. The foxes will also be looking for excess food for the newly born cubs which eat ravenously.
